mapper.select: SELECT SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG, AVG(REV_RATE) FROM STORE_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON SI.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE GROUP BY SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG ORDER BY STO_NUM
SELECT SI.STO_NUM, AVG(REV_RATE) FROM STORE_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON SI.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM GROUP BY SI.STO_NUM
